charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA - defendant, did conspire with others to possess with intent to distribute and to distribute 100 kilograms or more of Marijuana in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and Title 21, USC 846.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered the defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00, and a fine of $5,000.00. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for 36 months. Upon release, the defendant shall be on supervised release for 5 years.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 37 months BOP, 5 years supervised release, $7500 fine, and $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA - defendant, did conspire with others to possess with intent to distribute and to distribute 100 kilograms or more of Marijuana in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and Title 21, USC 846.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered the defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00 and a fine of $5,000.00. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for 24 months. Upon release, the defendant shall be on supervised release for 4 years. ON OCTOBER 22, 2015 DEFENDANT WAS REVOKED AND RESENTENCED to 6 months BOP and 36 months supervised release.
